text: Moominiiney sin labhay Rabtak gennaaqoh Agabu Addunyal caba maral sinni Agabuh Rooci keenik yawqek Naharat duyyek tu-keenih farriimaanam keenil tan Sanat gide ken dabooqak ken Ayyaaqe kalah, usun (Agabu kinnuk) sinni dooritik yewqeenik, Toysa num kak Rabe maraw usun islaam diini elle xiqsiisa innal sinni Nafsik Abeenimil dambi Siinil mayan, Yalli isi Reedal mayso-li Abba haamal Naggaara A-aayatih madqa taturte aayatih (234) madqat duugumte
